items.sentence: Why didn\'t you tell me what you were doing?
Someone has torn two pages out of this book.
Switzerland is famous for its scenic beauty.
Tell Tom about what you did the other night.
Nobody wants to work outdoors on a cold day.
Prague is the capital of the Czech Republic.
I want that information as soon as possible.
I want this more than anything in the world.
I want to ask you about the money you found.
I want to have something to remember you by.
Tom is old enough to be Mary\'s grandfather.
Tom is only pretending he\'s not interested.
Tom can sing better than anyone else I know.
I\'m not sure whether I\'m doing this right.
I\'m hungry because I didn\'t eat breakfast.
Tom arrived just in time to catch the train.
Tom asked Mary if she was free the next day.
Tom and I\'ll take turns watching your kids.
I assume that\'s the reason Tom isn\'t here.
Tom made a lot of money in the stock market.
